title: [Yegharren Valley, Trail]
description: The trail dips into a patch of low ground, dappled moonlight filtering through the sparse branches of the oaks and dogwoods to illuminate patches of green fiddlehead ferns.  A few fireflies dance around the path, and the cry of some distant nightbird echoes from somewhere to the east.

The trail dips into a patch of low ground, dappled sunlight filtering through the sparse branches of the oaks and dogwoods to splash on patches of bright green fiddlehead ferns.  The cry of a distant bird of prey echoes from somewhere to the east.
